DOC.brief_summary: This study aim evaluate cognitive enhancing effect tolerability GSK239512 compare placebo patient schizophrenia
DOC.brief_title: Study Evaluate Efficacy Safety GSK239512 Schizophrenia
DOC.detailed_description: This 7-week , Phase II , multi-centre , randomise , double-blind , placebo-controlled , parallel group design study male female subject schizophrenia stabilise antipsychotic medication . Subjects randomise receive either GSK239512 placebo 7 week . They undergo weekly review safety , tolerability cognitive performance measure .
DOC.criteria: 1 . Clinical diagnosis Schizophrenia 2 . No acute exacerbation symptom require hospital admission step care previous six month . 3 . Not symptomatic treatment cognition 1 . Poses significant homicidal suicidal risk evidence previous homicidal suicidal risk . 2 . Comorbid psychiatric significant physical illness 3 . Alcohol drug abuse dependence .
